titleInfo.title: Darkness and Light - MMus Choral Conducting Recital

mods.note: This audiovisual content is being provided solely for educational use and research, pursuant to exceptions in the Canadian Copyright Act. Further reproduction or distribution or other use may require additional permissions
mods.tableOfContents: Kyrie (Mass for Four Voices) / William Byrd (1540 - 1643) -- Requiem: Requiem aeternam I; Out of the Deep; And God Shall Wipe Away All Tears (Claire Rolheiser, soprano I; Caroline De Grave, soprano II; Patricia Paradis, alto I; Julie Golosky, alto II); In Remembrance; Requiem aeternam II; In Paradisum (Claire Rolheiser, soprano; Michael Kurschat, baritone; The Choir of Robertson-Wesley and Friends) / Eleanor Daley (b. 1955) -- Al lume de le stelle / Luca Marenzio (1553-1599) / Laudate Pueri, HWV 237: Laudate pueri Dominum; Sit nomen Domini; A solis ortu; Gloria Patri (Kimberley Taylor, soprano; Alison Norris, soprano; Abra Whitney, contralto; Sean McMann, tenor; Christa Eriksson, Oboe; Graduate Recital Chamber Orchestra) / G. F. Handel (1685-1759)
